title: Wagamama - Aberdeen Academy
typeOfFood: Japanese, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International franchise chain inspired by Japanese food. Vegetarian items are marked with a V and some can be made vegan, and are prepared in a separate grill. But likely there's has only 1 fryer for meat & veg. Menu shows information about the noodle varieties, stating which contain eggs, and kitchen could change the noodles to accommodate customer request.
streetAddress: Academy Centre Courtyard, School Hill, Belmont Street
